a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of adults who smoke in 2000 vs. 2018
The share of adults, aged 15 years and older, who consume any tobacco product, including cigarettes, cigars,
pipes or any smokeless tobacco products on a daily or non-daily basis. Electronic cigarettes are not included.
Data source: World Health Organization (via World Bank) (2025)
